hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.localization

Class LocalizationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.localization.AbstractLocalizationProvider
      • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.localization.LocalizationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocalizationProvider

    public class LocalizationProvider
extends AbstractLocalizationProvider
    Localization provider providing localization for it's listeners.

    It is a singleton to secure only one localization at one time is used in the program.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic
